original_text: Being therefore exalted at the right hand of God, and having received from the Father the promise of the Holy Spirit, he has poured out this that you yourselves are seeing and hearing.
korean_text: 하나님이 오른손으로 예수를 높이시매 그가 약속하신 성령을 아버지께 받아서 너희가 보고 듣는 이것을 부어 주셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Being therefore exalted at the right hand of God
and having received from the Father the promise of the Holy Spirit
that you yourselves are seeing and hearing
